title: How to Link Your Website to Your Twitter

steps.title: Sign in to X at https://www.twitter.com.
steps.content: Sign in to X at https://www.twitter.com . If you're using a phone or tablet, you can opt to use the Twitter mobile app instead of your browser.

steps.title: Click the profile icon on the left panel.
steps.content: Click the profile icon on the left panel. If you're using the mobile app, tap your profile photo at the top-left and select Profile instead.

steps.title: You'll see this oval button at the top of your profile.
steps.content: You'll see this oval button at the top of your profile. This is where you can make all sorts of changes to your profile, including adding the URL to your website.

steps.title: Type or paste your website's URL into the "Website" field.
steps.content: Type or paste your website's URL into the "Website" field. You'll see this field just below the "Location" option. Don't forget to add the https:// to the beginning of the address.

steps.title: You'll see the Save button at the top-right corner.
steps.content: You'll see the Save button at the top-right corner. Your website is now linked on your Twitter profile.
